Question: Perictione gave birth to Pyrilampes' second son, Antiphon, the half-brother of this person, who appears in Parmenides.
Hints: This person never speaks in his own voice in his dialogues.
Many papyri which contain fragments of this person's texts are among the Oxyrhynchus Papyri.
This person] supposed that their elements are the elements of all things.
